value.stringValue: AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Submit Offboarding Plan"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed") )
AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Task].Opportunity__c )), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Trigger Offboarding"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Opp_Tax_Status__c = "Yes" )
AND( NOT(ISNULL([Task].Opportunity__c )), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Send Separation Email 2"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Opp_Tax_Status__c = "Yes" )

AND( NOT(ISNULL([Task].Opportunity__c )), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Intro RA and Transfer RA Payments"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Opp_Tax_Status__c = "Yes" )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_20
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISNULL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"Intro RA and Transfer RA Payments"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status},"Completed"), {!myVariable_current.Opp_Tax_Status__c} = "Yes" )

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISNULL([Task].Opportunity__c )), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Transfer Gusto"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Opp_Tax_Status__c = "Yes" )
AND( NOT(ISNULL([Task].Opportunity__c )), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Trigger Offboarding"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Opp_Tax_Status__c = "No" )
AND( NOT(ISNULL([Task].Opportunity__c )), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Send Separation Email 2"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Opp_Tax_Status__c = "No" )

AND( NOT(ISNULL([Task].Opportunity__c )), OR( CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Send Final Separation Email"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Confirm QBO Transferred"), AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Archive Slack"), [Task].Opportunity__c.Refund__c ) ), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_35

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISNULL([Task].Opportunity__c )), OR( CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Transfer QBO"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Transfer Gusto"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Archive Slack"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Transfer RA") ), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_37
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISNULL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), OR( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"Transfer QBO"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"Transfer Gusto"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"Archive Slack"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"Transfer RA") ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status},"Completed") )

value.stringValue: AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Send Offboarding Email 1"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), [Task].Refund__c )

AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Send Offboarding Email 1"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed")
